meanings.definition: A person or thing that ruins or spoils something.
meanings.sent1: The careless campers left behind the ruiner of the peaceful forest.
meanings.sent2: The ruiners of the picnic were the unexpected rain and strong wind.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous raccoons were the ruiners of the campers' food supply.
meanings.sent4: The weeds in the garden were the silent ruiners of the beautiful flowers.
meanings.sent5: The spoiled milk in the fridge was the sneaky ruiner of the morning coffee.
